CustomField.formula: IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_5_rating__c)) > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxfj", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxc3", "-", 16, 16)) + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_5_rating__c)) > 1, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxfj", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxc3", "-", 16, 16)) + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_5_rating__c)) > 2, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxfj", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxc3", "-", 16, 16)) + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_5_rating__c)) > 3, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxfj", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxc3", "-", 16, 16)) + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_5_rating__c)) > 4, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxfj", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001Hxc3", "-", 16, 16))
CustomField.label: Out of 5 Ticks
